snippet.title: Monopoly 2 BS - Red Cup | ＢＳモノポリー 第2回 ? (Satellaview)
snippet.description:
This ROM's a bit different from the Yellow Cup one.
If I researched it right this may be
"BS Monopoly Kouza Boardwalk Heno Michi - Dai-2-Kai"
ＢＳモノポリー講座～ボードウォークへの道 第2回

Both the ROMs are marked as "Full Size+Soundlink" in spite of their apparent gameplay in emulation not having anything notably Soundlink-like.  
BTW, as for compatible emulators - BSNES is recommended. You'll need an emulator that can read the BS-X BIOs for it's currency, otherwise you can't play.

More info:
http://superfamicom.org/blog/2011/11/new-rom-dumps-and-how-a-board-game-can-blow-my-mind/
